reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 501/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - DESBARATS TO ECHO BAY PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — DESBARATS TO ECHO BAY PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 501/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - DESBARATS TO ECHO BAY PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consents under sections 50 and 53 of the Act with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the Desbarats to Echo Bay Planning Board. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consents under sections 50 and 53 of the Act with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the Desbarats to Echo Bay Planning Board. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is subject to the condition that the planning board comply with the rules of procedure contained in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 136/95. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is subject to the condition that the planning board comply with the rules of procedure contained in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 136/95. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in section 2 is not complied with. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in section 2 is not complied with. O. Reg. 501/98, s. 3.

4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 501/98, s. 4.
